error.message: Couldn't find Vm with 'id'=9999 [WHERE "vms"."type" IN ('Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::InfraManager::Vm', 'VmServer', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Amazon::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Openstack::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Azure::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Google::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Vmware::CloudManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Vmware::InfraManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Microsoft::InfraManager::Vm', 'ManageIQ::Providers::Redhat::InfraManager::Vm', 'VmXen') AND "vms"."template" = $1]
